Label: Purpose
Is Replaced By: To point the user to a newer item(s).

Label: Entry Guidelines
Is Replaced By: Enter the ID of the newer item(s) that should be used instead.

Label: Commentary
Is Replaced By: This field can be used with [Replaces](../ogm-aardvark/#replaces) to link an original dataset to a newer version. For example, if this dataset has already been cited somewhere but is now deprecated, it can be retained in a repository and this field can be used to link to its newer version.
